column5: Looking for recomendations for an outpost camp that has service from Winnipeg. Would like to fly comercial to Winnipeg, then have outfitter pick us up for flight into lake. Any thoughts?? Thanks

molson lake lodge will fly u out of winipeg to there home base which is an incredible lake or they have many outposts also. or try thunderbird lodge same type of services i've been to both now I bought a nice boat so I feel I have to go to driveins. sometimes I miss those fly ins.
